headlines.description: Marcus Rashford came off the bench to score a late winner in Manchester United's 1-0 victory at Wolves on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Super-sub Rashford earns late Man United win

headlines.description: Crystal Palace scored twice from set pieces in the first half to beat Bournemouth 2-0 away in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace cruise to away win at Bournemouth

headlines.description: — Joao Palhinha's late goal gave Fulham a 2-1 win over Southampton on Saturday, leaving the visitors stranded at the bottom of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palhinha nets late as Fulham beats Southampton 2-1 in EPL

headlines.description: — Demarai Gray scored a spectacular equalizer as struggling Everton had an unexpectedly happy end to the year with a 1-1 draw against Manchester City on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton holds Man City 1-1 despite another Haaland goal

headlines.description: Newcastle United missed the chance to close the gap to leaders Arsenal after they were held to a 0-0 draw at home to Leeds on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle winning run ends after Leeds draw

headlines.description: — Arsenal stretched its Premier League lead to seven points with a 4-2 win at Brighton on Saturday capped by a well-worked breakaway goal from Gabriel Martinelli.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal stretches lead to 7 points with 4-2 win at Brighton
